Package com.google.code.infusion.util

Class Summary
ChainedCallback<T> A partial implementation of AsyncCallback that delegates onFailure to another callback.
HttpRequestBuilder HTTP request builder that has an XHR-Based GWT super-source implementation
HttpResponse  
OAuthLogin Contains helper methods for each of the 3 legs of OAuth authentication.
OAuthToken Stores the OAuth token and secret.
Util A collection of utility methods, mainly for escaping.
